text: I came here after dinner nearby. It's great to have a park for recreation instead of just the nearby shopping malls. The park is fine but a little too small

I enjoy spending time in Toh Guan Park. It's an oasis of peace in the heart of the city. The greenery, walking routes, and fresh air are all refreshing. Ideal for a leisurely stroll or a family picnic.
The running track is 663m long, with playground for children, spaces for badminton, Futsal, basketball and two fitness areas for exercising.
Good location for Open, good track for jogging and greenery. Many birds on trees and there is fish pond.
I live in toh guan and the park has always been an enjoyable place, have spent lots of time with friends there
